intelligence_grade_justification: Good data on core offerings and some verified pricing. Test prep range well documented. Kids/teens pricing found. However, test prep course-specific pricing not captured (only General English). Social media data thin.

company_profile.legal_name: EMCAN English Training Center (also: Emcan Educational Institute)

test_prep_ielts.note: IELTS is a core offering — featured prominently on website

test_prep_pte.note: Rare offering in Tbilisi market — differentiator

test_prep_oet.note: Medical English test — very niche. May attract healthcare professionals

online_courses.note: EMCAN has expanded beyond Georgia market via online delivery

test_prep_courses.note: Prices not publicly listed for any test prep course. Likely similar range (300-400 GEL) based on course structure. Contact required.

pricing_intelligence.pricing_model: Per-course fixed fee with upfront payment discount. Not monthly subscription.
pricing_intelligence.vs_ih_tbilisi: EMCAN 320 GEL/6wk vs IH 350 GEL/month (3x/wk). EMCAN is slightly cheaper on face value, but IH is monthly recurring vs EMCAN's fixed term. EMCAN's max 5 students is smaller than IH's typical groups. EMCAN offers better value per student for small group attention.
pricing_intelligence.vs_british_council: EMCAN 320 GEL/6wk vs BC from 31 GEL/1.5hr. BC's credit system can be cheaper per hour at bulk, but EMCAN's all-inclusive fixed price is simpler.

instagram.note: Account exists — follower count not captured

social_media_intelligence.website_quality: 6/10 — Functional, clear course pages, dedicated page per test type. Not modern design. Mobile-friendly. No online booking system visible.
social_media_intelligence.content_marketing: Minimal — website serves as brochure, no blog

reviews_intelligence.assessment: Very few publicly accessible reviews. The school's reputation is not well-indexed online.

target_segments: Budget-conscious adults wanting small class sizes
value_propositions: Widest test prep range in Georgia (8 different exams)
Most affordable verified pricing among brick-and-mortar schools
PTE and OET — only provider in market for these niche exams
positioning.brand_positioning: Mid-market specialist — test prep factory with small classes
positioning.differentiation: Test prep breadth (8 exams) and tiny class sizes (max 5). No other school covers PTE, OET, AND academic tests.

strengths: Unmatched test prep breadth — 8 different exams under one roof
Smallest class sizes in market (max 5) — premium attention at mid-market price
Only PTE and OET provider in Georgia — monopoly on medical English testing prep
Competitive pricing with upfront discounts — appeals to price-sensitive students
Online expansion to 3 neighboring countries — growth beyond local market
Dedicated SAT page — strong SEO for university-bound students
weaknesses: Test prep pricing not public — friction for comparison shoppers
Weak brand recognition — doesn't appear in top-of-mind searches
strategic_vulnerabilities: IH Tbilisi's Cambridge authorization gives them exam credibility EMCAN can't match
British Council's IELTS test administration creates natural pipeline away from EMCAN
Preply undercuts on price for individual test prep tutoring
Beka's School's Cambridge partnership could eat into Cambridge exam prep
No corporate training program — missing B2B revenue

marketing_tactics.promotions: Upfront payment discount (50 GEL off adult course, 30-40 GEL off kids/teens)
marketing_tactics.mobile_app: Mentioned — 'mobile app access' as a feature
